blogPost.excerpt: To quote Netflix's Queen's Gambit "Chess isn't always competitive. Chess can also be beautiful." The Oxford Companion to Chess lists numerous openings that involve all kinds of wild tactical play. Find out which one best captures your startup’s strategy.
blogPost.body: To quote Netflix's Queen's Gambit "Chess isn't always competitive. Chess can also be beautiful." The Oxford Companion to Chess lists numerous openings that involve all kinds of wild tactical play. Find out which one best captures your startup’s strategy.
blogPost.title: The Startup's Gambit - Which chess opening best captures your startup’s strategy?
blogPost.author: Saksham Sharda

localize.description: 引用网飞“女王的赌博”中的一句话：“国际象棋并不总是好胜的，国际象棋也可以是美丽的。”“牛津国际象棋伙伴”列出了许多涉及各种狂野战术的空缺。找出哪一个最能抓住你创业公司的战略。
localize.tagline: 哪一盘国际象棋开局最能抓住你创业公司的战略？

localize.description: 引用網飛“女王的賭博”中的一句話：“國際象棋並不總是好勝的，國際象棋也可以是美麗的。”“牛津國際象棋夥伴”列出了許多涉及各種狂野戰術的空缺。找出哪一個最能抓住你創業公司的戰略。
localize.tagline: 哪一盤國際象棋開局最能抓住你創業公司的戰略？
